description:
The updated Kuhl Ramblr™ short is cut from Uberkuhl® strech fabric to keep up with the Ramblin' man. The next generation of bi-component fabric, Uberkuhl® strech is stronger, lighter and dries faster than cotton. A touch of spandex adds stretch for comfort and freedom of movement.

The gusseted crotch allows freedom of movement, and the waistband is lined with soft micro-chamois for unmatched comfort. The Vintage Patina Dye lends a classic look to this modern performance short.

The 3D pocket keeps your phone secure. Easy care, wash and wear keep you ramblin'.
name: Kuhl Ramblr Shorts, 10" Inseam - Mens
